recipe.name: Shrimp Casserole
recipe.notes: This dish is the sort of thing you'd expect from a person named "Lola Pickles" because both seem equally improbable.
recipe.preparation:
Devil 4-6 eggs. Place halves on bottom of greased casserole.
Pour over 1/3 can of mushroom soup.
Then in layers: 1 - 4 1/2 oz can broken shrimp 1/3 can mushroom soup 1/2 cup cheddar cheese crumbs
Top with corn flake crumbs or special K. Set in a pan of water. Bake at 300F for 1/2 hour
